entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
